name: Pixel Space (itch) (madlibrarian)
description:
Pixel Space!

Go beyond and into Pixel Space!!!

Game Jam submission. 

6 levels. Make it to the end without losing all your lives. Score is kept for and between levels. You survive each level enemy waves to win the level and move to the next. Avoid or shoot down enemy ships during wave attacks for points.  Stay clear of asteroids because they mean business.
